scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build /tmp/fullstack2022 && pushd /tmp && git clone -b part3 https://github.com/nicohi/fullstack2022.git && cd fullstack2022/part2/phonebook && npm install && npm run build && popd && cp -r /tmp/fullstack2022/part2/phonebook/build .
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add build && git commit -m uibuild && git push
